org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.common.debug

Class Printer<IN,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichMapFunction<IN,IN>
        • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.common.debug.Printer<IN,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - input type
    K - key type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.MapFunction<IN,IN>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFunction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrintDeletion, PrintEdgeStep, PrintEmbedding, PrintEmbeddingWithTiePoint, PrintFatVertex, PrintIdWithCandidates, PrintMessage, PrintTripleWithCandidates, PrintTripleWithDirection, PrintVertexStep

    public abstract class Printer<IN,K>
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichMapFunction<IN,IN>
    Base class for printing debug output using vertex and edge mappings. Both map an internal id to a readable numeric id.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EDGE_MAPPING
      Broadcast set name for edge mapping
      protected Map<K,PropertyValue> edgeMap
      Mapping gradoopId -> propertyValue The value is used to represent the edge with the corresponding id.
      protected boolean isIterative
      Used to differ between iterative and non-iterative runtime context.
      protected String prefix
      String is put in front of debug output.
      static String VERTEX_MAPPING
      Broadcast set name for vertex mapping
      protected Map<K,PropertyValue> vertexMap
      Mapping gradoopId -> propertyValue The value is used to represent the vertex with the corresponding id.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Printer

        public Printer()
        Constructor

      • Printer

        public Printer(boolean isIterative,
               String prefix)
        Constructor Automatically determines the current iteration when instantiated in Flink iteration.
        Parameters:
        isIterative - true, if called in a Flink iterative context (i.e. bulk/delta iteration)
        prefix - prefix for output

      • Printer

        public Printer(int iterationNumber,
               String prefix)
        Constructor Requires the manual definition of the current iteration. This is necessary when called outside a Flink iteration, but in an iterative context (e.g. a Java loop).
        Parameters:
        iterationNumber - current iteration
        prefix - prefix for debug string

      • convertList

        protected List<PropertyValue> convertList(List<K> ids,
                                          boolean isVertex)
        Converts a list of ids into a list of corresponding property values.
        Parameters:
        ids - gradoop ids
        isVertex - true - use vertex mapping, false - use edge mapping
        Returns:
        list of property values

      • log

        public static <T,K> org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<T> log(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<T> dataSet,
                                                             Printer<T,K> printer,
                                                             org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple2<K,PropertyValue>> vertexMapping,
                                                             org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple2<K,PropertyValue>> edgeMapping)
        Prints out logging information if logging is enabled and mapping information is available.
        Type Parameters:
        T - dataset type
        K - key type
        Parameters:
        dataSet - dataset to be logged
        printer - prints each dataset row (or a subset of it)
        vertexMapping - mapping between vertex id and debug property value
        edgeMapping - mapping between edge id and debug property value
        Returns:
        unmodified dataset
